sentence.Network_en: The most popular spectator sport is football.
sentence.Network_cn: 观赏性强、最受欢迎的体育运动是足球。

sentence.Network_en: A spectator threw the ball back to the players.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个观众把球掷回给球员.

sentence.Network_en: He was content to stand by as an impassive spectator.
sentence.Network_cn: 他满足于站在旁边做一个冷漠的旁观者.

means.word_mean: 观众,观察家,游览者,旁观者,目击者

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French spectateur or Latin spectator, from spectare 'gaze at, observe' (see spectacle)

entry.def: A spectator is someone who watches something, especially a sporting event.

example.ex: Thirty thousand spectators watched the final game.

means.word_mean: 1. a close observer; someone who looks at something (such as an exhibition of some kind);
2. a woman's pump with medium heel; usually in contrasting colors for toe and heel

stems_affixes.word_buile: circum周围+spect看→看周围→小心
per全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了的→透视的
prospect前景+ive……的→adj.预期的
respect尊敬+able可以……的→adj.可敬的;人格高尚的
respect尊敬,尊重+ful有……的→adj.恭敬的,尊重的
re回+spect看+ive……的→回头看[自己]→各自的
retrospect[v.回顾,回想]+ive……的→adj.追想的,回顾的
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
respective[adj.各自的,各个的]+ly表副词→adv.分别地, 各个地
pro前面+spect看→向前看→前景

stems_affixes.value_cn: 样子, 外表, 面貌, [问题等的]方面
stems_affixes.word_buile: a加强意义+spect看→看的东西→外表,容貌
circumspect[adj.小心谨慎的]+ion表名词→n.细心,慎重
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+or人→n.检查员, 巡视员
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+ion表名词→n.检查,审查;检阅

stems_affixes.value_cn: 章程,内容简介;创办计划
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前+spect看+us→向前看的东西
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
spect看+acle东西→看的东西→景象;眼镜
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
spect看+ator人→看的人
spect看+rum→可以看的范围
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
ex出+pect=spect看→看出去,看外面→期待
in内,里面+spect看→看里面→检查
retro向后+spect看→向后看
spec=spect看+ulate→看准了→思考,投机
sus下面+spect看→在下面看一看,斜眼看→怀疑

sentences.en: Many spectators watched the baseball game.
sentences.cn: 许多观众都观看了棒球比赛。

jushi.english: Many spectators watched the baseball game.
jushi.chinese: 许多观众都观看了棒球比赛。
